innhold.avsnitt: It is your employer who submits the income report.

It can be a good idea to remind your employer of this when the time approaches. When you have applied, you will receive a document you can give your employer that will be useful when the employer is completing the income report. Your employer can see how to submit an income report.
If you are self-employed or freelance, you do not need to submit any documentation. We gather the information we need from public records and will contact you if we need more information.
